overview: -Temporary gestures. Gaze stuck in the glass.  While imagining the world beyond the screen, I came to face a reality trapped in a flat world, yet which disappeared soon. This is a consideration on whether it is a world that I reached by following the flow of consciousness or an existing reality.  -Dialogue source  00:00:37:03~00:03:03:06  File name: 20170919.m4a
title: Window to window
